description: Products of distinct terms of A001566: a(n) = Product(L(2^(i+1))^bit(n,i),i = 0..[log2(n+1)]).
comments: Each subset a[0..(2^k)-1] gives all the divisors of F(2^(k+1)) up to k=4 (F_32) and after that a subset of such divisors. E.g. the terms a(0)-a(7) are the divisors of F_16 = 987 (A018760).
links: A. Karttunen, On Pascal's Triangle Modulo 2 in Fibonacci Representation, Fibonacci Quarterly, 42 (2004), 38-46.
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k, 0<=k<=n}A127872(n,k)*Fibonacci(2*k+1), see A000045 and A001519. - _Philippe DelÃ©ham_, Aug 30 2007
crossrefs: Bisection of A075149 and A050613 (see there for the other Maple procedures), subset of A062877. Cf. also A050615.
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 02 1999
